changes: Add limited mode selector to navigation bar

Add option to only show 2P or V5 decks in deck selector when limited mode is on. To use it toggle 'Only show Limited decks in Deck Selector' in /account page and add '2P' and/or 'V5' tags to the decks you want to see in selector for respective limited mode
Add % of restricted cards for current limited mode in deck crypt/library header
Fix deck clan/path icon sometimes being wrongly determined
